text: Frank Paul Sylos (1900–1976) was an American art director.Fetrow p.186 He worked on around a hundred and ninety films during his career, as well as television shows. He is sometimes credited as Frank P. Sylos. ==Selected filmography== * The Fabulous Suzanne (1946) * Albuquerque (1948) * The Return of Jesse James (1950) * Boy, Did I Get a Wrong Number! (1966) ==References== ==Bibliography== * Fetrow, Alan G. Feature Films, 1950-1959: A United States Filmography. McFarland, 1999. ==External links== * Category:1900 births Category:1976 deaths Category:American art directors
title: Frank Paul Sylos
